The vision of busuu is to revolutionize the way people learn new languages.

jobs.title: Backend Engineer (PHP)
jobs.description:
As the largest social network for language learning in the world we’ve already had some great success, but there is so much more that we want to build and improve on. We’re looking for smart, agile, independent engineers who can help us take our APIs to the next level, enabling more amazing ways for our users to interact with each other and learn even more. We’re looking for someone who loves to think about the server side, but also remembers that they are building APIs for end users and helps to tailor the experience for them.

We use PHP7/Symfony, Node.js, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, and Docker to get things done, but we’re always open to change and the best tool for the job should be the one we’re using.

Why is a Backend Software Engineer important at busuu?

From building new distributed APIs and storing massive amounts of data, to using machine learning and building bot platforms, there are many exciting challenges for the Backend team at busuu.

As a Backend Engineer, you’ll be at the front line of all our changes, with the authority and responsibility to make decisions that will affect the platform and our users for the better. Our team is still small enough that every engineer makes a massive difference.

What does a Backend Engineer do at busuu?

You’ll have the opportunity to be at the centre of our biggest and most exciting phase yet, making big decisions that will help you grow and define your career as a Software Engineer. You’ll ship code often, support it all the way to production, and work with our web/mobile engineers and product teams to ensure a joined up experience for our users.

You’ll work on a platform that is serving 70 million users in over 190 countries, supporting a huge amount of different payment methods across all territories, integrations with some of the biggest mobile operators in the world, and an ever growing catalogue of languages and ways to learn.

What makes a great Backend Engineer at busuu...

Excellent knowledge of PHP/OOP and experience with a modern web framework (we use Symfony 3). Node.js experience is a plus.
Good experience of data modelling and performance optimisation using relational databases (we use MySQL and PostgreSQL).
Solid knowledge of REST API design.
Exposure to the architecture of high traffic web platforms.
Experience with testing methodologies, performance debugging and benchmarking.
Ability to work outside your comfort zone, take a problem and solve it with as much or as little support as you need.
Not ticking every box or think you’ve got that unique set of skills we haven’t realised we need? Get in touch anyway; we’re always looking to add great people! There are lots of indications that some people only apply to roles when they meet all the qualifications for a role, however we’d encourage you to apply even if you don’t believe you meet all the criteria! We don’t believe that ticking off a list of skills is the only thing that makes a great candidate. You can read more about how we're building a more diverse team on our tech blog.

Have a read through our tech blog to learn more about what we're up to! https://tech.busuu.com

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at busuu. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Benefits…

* Competitive salary.
* Bonus Scheme.
* Private healthcare.
* Gym membership.
* Choose your own equipment.
* Free breakfast and snacks.
* Free dinner if you need to stay late.
* Regular company trips (our last was to Mallorca) and evenings out in London.
* Friday socialising - we make sure we stop working and spend time together at the end of the week.

jobs.title: Senior Android Engineer
jobs.description:
Are you interested in languages, education and technology and want to work in one of the world's best EdTech startups? Then join us and be part of an ambitious and talented team that revolutionises how we learn languages.

**About us**

Busuu is the app that makes learning a language easier for everyone and proves that learning a language doesn’t have to be done in a classroom.

We are the world's largest language learning community with over 100 million users  190 countries, growing at up to 30,000 new users per day. We make learning a language easy by combining AI-powered courses with instant feedback from our global community of native speakers and live tutoring from qualified teachers across the world. 

If you are passionate about languages, want to work with smart, creative, energetic people and possess the initiative, confidence and good judgement to make independent decisions every day - then you are probably the perfect addition for our growing team. 

If you are passionate about languages, want to work with smart, creative, energetic people and possess the initiative, confidence and good judgement to make independent decisions every day - then you are probably the perfect addition for our growing team. 

**What does a Senior Android Engineer do at Busuu?**

As an Senior Android Engineer, you’ll be working on our flagship and region specific apps, shipping to over 40 countries throughout the world in over 10 languages, offering our users a huge variety of languages to learn from. You’ll think about how users interact with our learning experience, how to help them learn better and faster and then build an experience that everyone can enjoy learning with. 

You’ll work on brand new and existing features, shipping often and supporting your application all the way to production and beyond. You’ll work with an amazing, experienced team of Android engineers, and think about the entire life cycle of the application, from architecture to automated testing. We’re not afraid to do the right thing, refactoring when necessary while at the same time ensuring that we’re shipping new features to consumers as fast as possible. ** **

**What we’re looking for in a Senior Android Engineer: **

- Professional Android development experience, with a history of shipping Android apps
- Knowledge in unit testing in Android (Mockito would be perfect)
- Good foundation in Android UI principles. You will be working with a UX team, but your suggestions and design ideas will be appreciated and considered
- Good understanding of Android app architecture and use of design patterns
- Strong OO & Java skills, some experience with Kotlin with an appreciation for pragmatism and simplicity in code

**In return we will ensure that you have:**

- Flexible working hours. If you prefer early starts, late finishes or the odd day working from home
- Monthly & quarterly company team activities, Friday socials and other activities
- Training budget, so you can learn more in your field, attend conferences and events that you find interesting
- Perkbox subscription with a lot of great benefits in it
- Private health insurance
- Weekly office yoga
- Pension contributions
- We love animals, if you have a furry friend, feel free to bring them with you
- Enhanced maternity and paternity leave 
- A well-equipped London office with free breakfast, plenty of snacks, fresh fruit and free dinner of your choice if you need to stay late ** **

**What happens next**

We aim to have a simple and speedy hiring process and we want to make sure that we are right for you as much as the other way around. The hiring process for Senior Android Engineer  are the following 4 steps:

1. **CV application review - ** We will review it as quickly as possible and update on the next steps
2. **Let’s chat  -** Quick chat with our recruiter about your experience and the role 
3. **A video call -** 40 min call with the hiring manager on the exercise feedback and the role 
4. **Meet the team - ** 2,5 hours pair coding exercise and meeting with the wider tech team 

*Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. We pride ourselves on embracing our differences, whether they're cultural, racial, religious or otherwise. This means each one of us comes to work knowing that we have a voice – and a safe, judgement-free zone to speak freely.  
If you like the sound of that, join us. We'd love to hear what you have to say.*

jobs.title: Junior I&A Analyst
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Junior I&A Analyst who will help us identify growth areas, support other teams with data and optimise processes.

 

This is an amazing opportunity for someone to dive into massive data sets and, drive business decisions based on insights and help the business grow. You will have the chance to work across all departments, supporting the constant improvement of our product and overall business growth, as well as automating data pipelines and integrations. You will analyse complex data from multiple sources, detect opportunities and improvement areas and help teams deliver their projects.

 

What does a Junior I&A Analyst do at busuu?

You will be working closely with finance to drive monthly reporting of our core metrics and financial performance. You will be analysing data trends and driving insights into the business that enable customer-centric behaviours, which will amplify our business performance.

 

With a huge pool of data at your disposal, you will develop novel strategies to target our users and work closely with other teams to examine performance trends of busuu on an on-going basis. You will also identify areas within product and/or marketing to improve our core business metrics.

 

What we’re looking for in a Junior I&A Analyst at busuu…

Good knowledge of SQL and Excel
Proven ability to apply analytical and creative thought to gain intelligent data insights
You will have the ability to interpret complex data sets and come up with actionable recommendations
Experience with Python, R or any other programming language
Good technical and analytical communication skills
Commercially minded and always thinking of the customers' current and future needs
You live and breathe data, and can use it to help teams make the right decisions
Comfortable working in a fast paced start-up environment
 

Good to be...

Comfortable designing and analysing A/B and multivariate tests
Experienced with BI Tools such as Tableau/Amplitude
 

Not ticking every box or think you’ve got that unique set of skills we haven’t realised we need? Get in touch anyway; we’re always looking to add great people at every level.

 

Benefits

Competitive salary
Bonus Scheme
Private healthcare
Gym membership
Free breakfast and snacks
Free dinner if you need to stay late
Regular company events and evenings out in London



About busuu

busuu’s vision is to break down language barriers. We are the world’s largest language learning community with over 90m users from 190 countries, growing at over 30,000 new users per day. We make learning a language easy by combining AI-powered courses with instant feedback from our global community of native speakers.

busuu has received several awards such as ‘Europe’s Best Education Start-up’ by TechCrunch, ‘Best of iOS Apps’ by Apple and ‘Best of Google Play’ by Google to name a few and we are part of the prestigious Future Fifty Program consisting of UK’s best Scale-Ups. If you are passionate about languages, want to work with smart, creative, energetic people and possess the initiative, confidence and good judgement to make independent decisions every day - then you are probably the perfect addition for our growing team. 

**What we’re looking for in an iOS Engineer: **

- Professional iOS development experience, with a history of shipping iOS apps.
- Strong OO &  Swift skills, with an appreciation for pragmatism and simplicity in code.

- Knowledge of unit testing in iOS.
- Understanding of web services and REST APIs.

**About us**

Busuu is the app that makes learning a language easier for everyone and proves that learning a language doesn’t have to be done in a classroom.

We are the world's largest language learning community with over 100 million users in 190 countries, growing at up to 30,000 new users per day. We make learning a language easy by combining AI-powered courses with instant feedback from our global community of native speakers and live tutoring from qualified teachers across the world. 

If you are passionate about languages, want to work with smart, creative, energetic people and possess the initiative, confidence and good judgement to make independent decisions every day - then you are probably the perfect addition for our growing team. 

**What does a Product Designer do at Busuu?**

As a Product Designer at Busuu, you will have the opportunity to create delightful and engaging experiences, pushed to millions of users every day. You will lead design projects in your squad across the entire product lifecycle and multiple product launches.

You will partner with product managers and engineers to find elegant but practical solutions to design challenges and you will work closely with engineers as they build and ship ideas. You will get to know our users and leverage their feedback to quickly ideate, design, iterate, and launch products and features they love and at the same time, meet business needs.

We are growing our strong design team and you will be part of this by creating a strong design culture across the company, encouraging feedback, helping to build and improve our new brand and design system.

**What we’re looking for in a Product Designer:**

- Ability to produce polished, high-fidelity mockups and prototypes of product workflows
- Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills
- Must be customer-centric, exceptionally detail-oriented, and results-driven
- Have a growth mindset, test and measure your design solutions with a mix of qualitative and quantitative methods
- Work collaboratively in a flexible way with other designers, product managers, researchers, engineers and stakeholders
- Be confident to work and improve an evolving brand and design system
- Have a keen interest in illustration and iconography

**In return we will ensure that you have:**

- Flexible working hours. If you prefer early starts, late finishes or the odd day working from home
- Monthly & quarterly company team activities, Friday socials and other activities
- Training budget, so you can learn more in your field, attend conferences and events that you find interesting
- Perkbox subscription with a lot of great benefits in it
- Private health insurance
- Weekly office yoga
- Pension contributions
- We love animals, if you have a furry friend, feel free to bring them with you
- Enhanced maternity and paternity leave 
- A well-equipped London office with free breakfast, plenty of snacks, fresh fruit and free dinner of your choice if you need to stay late

**What happens next**

We aim to have a simple and speedy hiring process and we want to make sure that we are right for you as much as the other way around. The hiring process for the Product Designer role are the following 4 steps:

1. **CV application review** - We will review it as quickly as possible and update on the next steps
2. **Let’s chat**   - Quick chat about your experience and the role 
3. **Portfolio review** - You will be asked to prepare 1 or 2 case studies and then present it to the design team in the interview
4. **Design challenge**  **and meet the team** - You will be asked to participate in a collaborative challenge and present to the team, after that 1/1.5 hours meeting with someone from the product and engineering teams

jobs.title: Backend Engineer (PHP)
jobs.description:
At Busuu we have just overcome 100-Million users worldwide and shown that learning a language can be done outside of a classroom. Technology brings learning into our private and business space and to keep us ahead of our competitors,  we are  looking for motivated talent who will help us reach our next milestone. 

Working at that scale is not always an easy task, and we know that there are challenges ahead, so we are looking for someone who wants to become a better version of themself and master the challenge together with us.  We want to grow not only into new markets, but also with new features and tools for our social network. 

We are looking for passionate people who honestly love solving problems, by questioning the status quo and eager to build a legacy with Busuu. 

As a Senior Back-End Engineer we have great things to come into your area of responsibilities.

You will work with other Engineering Members in building scalable services, which will operate across different Data Centers. You will participate in architecture discussion and shape how Busuu will work for the next 10 years. You will be part of the new payment squad in Madrid and work with other engineers on payments, promotions & subscriptions APIs.

**What makes an amazing Senior Back-End Engineer at Busuu**

- Excellent knowledge in PHP7 and/or nodeJS and building scalable services.
- Experience in data modelling and performance optimisation using relational databases (we use MySQL and PostgreSQL).
- Solid knowledge of API design, RESTFul or gRPC.
- Exposure to high traffic platforms.
- Experience with SOLID, Design Patterns, TDD
- Experience working with legacy code base and its transition into MS-Architecture 
- Experience working in transactional projects like: payments, promotions, bookings, subscriptions
- Ability to work outside your comfort zone, take a problem and solve it with as much or as little support as you need.

**Nice to have:**

 

- **Expertise in any of these technologies: WebRTC,  GraphQL, NoSQL**
- Experience with Event/Stream architecture

 

**What can you expect working at Busuu Spain?**

You will be based in our new Madrid Office and have the opportunity to travel to our HQ in London for short-term visits. 

At Busuu we know that when we work hard we should find time to relax and have fun, this is why we encourage our members to join our quarterly team events, to build personal relationships with your peers. 

We offer several special perks to our employees, which are:

- Competitive salary
- Work from home Policy 
- Bonus scheme
- Private healthcare
- Free snacks 
- Free dinner if you decided to work late

This is an amazing opportunity for someone to dive into massive data sets and find the golden nuggets at the core of our business, driving the most critical KPI's of the company. 

This is a critical and highly visible role for the business. Reporting directly to the CFO, you’ll work closely with the leaders in the business to drive change. Your remit will include all areas where we can use analytics to improve business performance. You will be expected to positively influence:

Strategy: With a huge pool of data at your disposal, you will have an expert understanding of the business to work alongside other teams to achieve business objectives

Growth: You will be working closely with the growth team to find areas of improvement within the product through A/B test design and analysis, performance reviews and be the data analytics expert within that team

Finance: You will own the KPI’s, from monthly reporting of our core metrics and financial performance to driving insights and change into the business

Team: Build a world class I&A team and mentor junior members across the business 

You’re the part of Busuu with real-life data problems to solve. You’ll bring the knowledge and drive to innovate new technology adoption in the data space, both within the team and in product development across Busuu.

**What I&A Lead does at Busuu:**

- Applying your expertise in quantitative analysis, data mining and the presentation of data to see beyond the numbers and understand how our users interact with our product, identify growth opportunities and execute on projects to drive growth engagement
- Driving the change through designing, developing and deploying reporting solutions to support colleagues in tracking growth and performance metrics
- Understanding ecosystems, user behaviours and long-term trends and loop back to the business to strategically guide the product changes and other teams initiatives
- Identifying new levers to help move key metrics 
- Influencing stakeholders through presentation of data-based recommendations
- Managing and growing the team as well as offering guidance to other teams and colleagues

**What we’re looking for**

We’re looking for someone who has great insight and analytics knowledge. They should exhibit:

- Extensive experience in Management Consultancy and previous BI experience in a data-driven company
- Excellent working knowledge of Excel, SQL and other programming languages
- Experience executing A/B and multivariate testing and relevant tools
- Experience with high transaction volume B2C businesses with global user base
- Experience working with Tableau and other event based tools and analytic platforms (e.g Amplitude)
- Strong leadership  and team management skills

Not ticking every box or think you’ve got that unique set of skills we haven’t realised we need? Get in touch anyway; we’re always looking to add great people at every level.

As a Backend Engineer, you’ll be key to us releasing high quality, bug free software daily. We love to ship often and fast, and you'll be key to ensuring we are running at maximum efficiency to deliver for the business and our users.

*What we’re looking for in a Senior Backend Engineer *

  • Excellent knowledge of PHP/OOP and experience with a modern web framework (we use Symfony 3/4). Node.js experience is a plus.
  • Good experience of data API design and exposure to the architecture of high traffic web platforms.
  • Experience with testing methodologies, performance debugging and benchmarking.
  • Experience in leading projects and cross-functional collaboration within the organisation.

In return we will ensure that you have:

  • Flexible working hours. If you prefer early starts, late finishes or the odd day working from home
  • Monthly & quarterly company team activities, Friday socials and other activities
  • Training budget, so you can learn more in your field, attend conferences and events that you find interesting
  • Perkbox subscription with a lot of great benefits in it
  • Weekly office yoga
  • Pension contributions
  • Enhanced maternity and paternity leave
  • A well-equipped London office with free breakfast, plenty of snacks, fresh fruit and free dinner of your choice if you need to stay late ** **

What happens next

We aim to have a simple and speedy hiring process and we want to make sure that we are right for you as much as the other way around. The hiring process for Senior Backend Engineer are the following 4 steps:

  1. CV application review - We will review it as quickly as possible and update on the next steps
  2. Let’s chat - Quick chat with our recruiter about your experience and the role
  3. A video call - 40 min call with the hiring manager on the exercise feedback and the role
  4. Meet the team - 1,5 hours pair coding exercise and meeting with the wider tech team

Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. We pride ourselves on embracing our differences, whether they're cultural, racial, religious or otherwise. This means each one of us comes to work knowing that we have a voice – and a safe, judgement-free zone to speak freely.

If you like the sound of that, join us. We'd love to hear what you have to say.

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
jobs.description:
At Busuu we have just overcome 100-Million users worldwide and shown that learning a language can be done outside of a classroom. Technology brings learning into our private and business space and to keep us ahead of our competitors,  we are  looking for motivated talent who will help us reach our next milestone. 

Working at that scale is not always an easy task, and we know that there are challenges ahead, so we are looking for someone who wants to become a better version of themself and master the challenge together with us.  We want to grow not only into new markets, but also with new features and tools for our social network. 

We are looking for passionate people who honestly love solving problems, by questioning the status quo and eager to build a legacy with Busuu. 

**What Senior Frontend Engineer Does In Madrid**

As a Senior Front-End Engineer we have great things to come into your area of responsibilities.

You will be working in the area of B2B tooling, where you are going to apply your expertise to ramp up with the Management tooling as well as very specific B2B-Client projects. You will directly impact our biggest B2B clients and shape how their employees learn languages.

**What makes an amazing Senior Front-End Engineer at Busuu****?**

- Excellent knowledge of JS and and expertise in frontend frameworks such as React or Vue
- Expertise of the DOM, HTML, CSS and associated web technologies.
- Experience working with RESTful APIs.
- Ability to translate a design into HTML and CSS.

**Nice to have**

- **Expertise in any of these technologies: WebRTC,  GraphQL, NoSQL**
- Expertise in NPM or YARN, Webpack, TDD, Testing Frameworks

**What can you expect working at Busuu Spain?**

You will be based in our new Madrid Office in Paseo de Castellana, and have the opportunity to travel to our HQ in London for short-term visits. 

At Busuu we know that when we work hard we should find time to relax and have fun, this is why we encourage our members to join our quarterly team events, to build personal relationships with your peers. 

We offer several special perks to our employees, which are:

- Competitive salary
- Work from home Policy 
- Bonus scheme
- Private healthcare
- GymPass membership 
- Free snacks 
- Free dinner if you work passed 19h
